column1: I'm Mr. Meeseeks! Look at me!
Try again and keep your head down!
Most importantly
YOU GOT TO JUST CHOKE UP ON THE CLUB!
JUST TRY TO RELAX!
Why did you even rope me into this?
I'm the one who SUCKS!
It's gettin' weird!
We are created to serve a singular purpose
column2: for which we will go to any lengths to fulfill!

column1: Is he keeping his shoulders squared?
He's sure trying!
Yes
Ooh yeah! Can do!
Ooh yeah! Yes
In conclusion
column2: a friendship with Summer Smith is the most valuable and enriching experience of your young lives.

column1: This is just as frustrating for us as it is for you.
I can't take it anymore. I just want to die!
The only thing that is clear is that choking up is the one true solution.
I've been trying to help you for two days
column3: and nothing's worked. I fear the worst.

column1: You know the best thing you can do for people that depend on you? Be honest with them
column2: even if it means setting them free.

column1: Remember to square your shoulders.
None of us can die until our job is done.
It's become clear that if we concentrate all our efforts on your follow through
column2: we will solve this problem. I'm Mr. Meeseeks.

column1: Aww
column2: come on. We've been over this.

column1: I'm a bit of a stickler Meeseeks - what about your short game?
